Test Case Description: Verify the username field accepts valid input.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Enter a valid username and move to the next field.
Expected Result: Username is accepted and moves to the next field.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Email Field for Empty Input
Test Case Description: Verify the email field does not accept empty input.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Leave the email field empty and attempt to submit.
Expected Result: Error message for empty email field is displayed.

Test Case Description: Verify the email field accepts valid email format only.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Enter an invalid email format and attempt to submit.
Expected Result: Error message for invalid email format is displayed.

Test Case Description: Verify the system checks for unique emails.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Enter an email that already exists in the system.
Expected Result: Error message for duplicate email is displayed.

Test Case Description: Verify that the system generates a unique user ID automatically.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Fill all fields and submit the form.
Expected Result: A unique auto-generated User ID is created.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Age Field Only Accepts Numeric Input
Test Case Description: Verify the age field only accepts numeric input.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Enter non-numeric characters in the Age field and attempt to submit.
Expected Result: Error message for non-numeric characters in the Age field is displayed.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Age Field for Empty Input
Test Case Description: Verify the age field does not accept empty input.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Leave the Age field empty and attempt to submit.
Expected Result: Error message for empty Age field is displayed.

Test Case Description: Verify that age input is within the valid range (e.g., 18-99).
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Enter an age below 18 or above 99 and submit.
Expected Result: Error message for invalid age is displayed.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Password and Confirm Password Fields
Test Case Description: Verify password and confirm password fields accept valid input.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Enter a valid password and confirm password.
Expected Result: Password and Confirm Password fields accept valid input.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Password and Confirm Password Match
Test Case Description: Verify that the password and confirm password fields match.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Enter different passwords in Password and Confirm Password fields.
Expected Result: Error message for mismatched passwords is displayed.

Test Case Description: Verify that the password meets minimum strength criteria (e.g., 8 characters).
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Enter a weak password (less than 8 characters) and submit.
Expected Result: Error message for weak password is displayed.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Form Submission with Valid Data
Test Case Description: Verify successful form submission with valid data.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Fill all fields with valid data and submit the form.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Form Submission with Empty Fields
Test Case Description: Verify form submission displays errors when required fields are empty.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the signup page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Signup page.
2. Leave required fields empty and submit the form.
Expected Result: Error messages for empty required fields are displayed.
